Reviews.Content: This is a poor camera with blurry images. On Amazon description, it says it comes with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Lens, but its not true! It comes with Sony Lens. It takes nice Pictures outdoor, but its not good for indoors.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures and slower autofocus than previous model
Reviews.Author: S. Nova
Reviews.Content: My previous camera in this line (a Sony DSC-W150) took fantastic, sharp indoor photos. Auto focus was quick, pictures were noise-free. When I lost it, I wanted another Sony Cybershot in the same series to replace it. I expected another great all-around pocket camera for taking pictures of pets, family and friends. I have been so disappointed--after taking an impossibly long time to autofocus, it takes grainy, blurry photos everytime. There are much better options at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Z. PENA "ZMAN"
Reviews.Content: Great camera,very bright flash,love the panorama, but slow adjusting to the focus so the pictures doesn't come out blurry.Over all very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony dsc-w370 camera
Reviews.Author: huntinbob06
Reviews.Content: Great compact 14 megapixel with high def video. After shooting over 200 pictures and about 15 minutes of video, the battery is still going. Amazing!

Reviews.Title: only the best
Reviews.Author: daren
Reviews.Content: sony seems to be one of the best camera makers,i have tried other makes and models only to come back to sony,this model works great for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Very good at this price
Reviews.Author: Planoguy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift.  Very happy with its quality of image and its look.  The only problem with it is the life of battery, and it is expensive to buy an additional back-up battery.Overall, good camera at the price.

Reviews.Title: Juanka's Photografy
Reviews.Author: Juanka
Reviews.Content: My experience in the way to buy by Amazon was so good.The camera is so perfect to enjoy the special moments of life.  Congratulatios.

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: georgette
Reviews.Content: i want to know if the camera comes with the auxiliary cable for the computer, i mean the USB cable

Reviews.Title: Worked for two weeks
Reviews.Author: chloe
Reviews.Content: after i received the camera in the mail i was initially excited about it. it has a lot of great features and i especially like the panoramic option. however after using it for only two weeks the screen was not working right. there was no visible crack and i keep my camera in a hard case just so things like that don't happen. after calling the company about it they said that my only option was to send it in for repair which can take up to 14 days. i've sent it in and am awaiting it's return. will put up a follow up review when i get it back.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing....poor exposure and color
Reviews.Author: Outdoorsy
Reviews.Content: Purchased July 1, 2010 and took many pics while on camping/hiking trip in the Rockies.  The image quality of this camera is very inconsistent.  Some shots taken merely seconds apart look very different; one will look good and the next will have poor color and poor exposure (over exposed/washed out).  This varying color and exposure also shows up when recording HD video.  I am a competent photographer who understands auto-exposure control and its limitations.  I would return the camera if I could.  Just sent it in to Sony for warranty "repair", hoping they find something wrong with it...and can fix it!

Reviews.Title: Sony it's not a Sony
Reviews.Author: Braulio R. Santos
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera 3 years ago, when was a new model by Sony.Have good things like panoramic pictures, but in 2 weeksof use  the front door to protect the lenses was stuck.When the memory card is close to the high capacity, the camera stay crazy, doesn't work OK until you clean the memory card.SONY, it's not a SONY any more.... very disapointed.

Reviews.Title: So Disappointed
Reviews.Author: John "John"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera from Sony Style Store and used only 3 hours. It stopped working. LCS Screen showed "Turn power off and on again!". I tried but not made it working. Looks like I wasted $200 now. Now, I do not trust Sony product any more (just like "Toyota").

Reviews.Title: Short Battery Life
Reviews.Author: Naida E. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Very short battery life.  Sweep Panorama is a great feature.  Took it to Europe and also took my Canon Power Shot.  Not all places I stayed at had the capability of using an adapter (and using converter is not an option on the Sony camera)to charge battery.  Pictures taken with both cameras were comparable in quality.  However, I still have a lot to learn about the many features the Sony offers.

Reviews.Title: Camera basically salvage after 13 months.
Reviews.Author: Jason Kemp
Reviews.Content: I used to buy everything Sony, and it seems lately, that I'm not.I bought two Sony desktop computers, which were both junk.I bought a Cybershot about 10 years ago, which lasted almost 9 years.Even after buying this camera, we still like our old one better.This camera has all the features you want.I mainly bought it for the zoom feature while using movie mode.My mother-in-law turned it on and the lens assembly was stuck.Calling multiple places for repair, they said that replacing the lens assembly is close to a $200 repair.Researching online gave me the same answer.Needless to say, this is the last Sony digital camera I'm buying.For point and shoot, you're better off not spending more than $100.Very disappointed in this.

Reviews.Title: Sony Fan - Disappointment
Reviews.Author: NatureGuy360
Reviews.Content: I really had high hopes for this camera when I purchased it over a year ago. As a loyal Sony Fan, I owned a Sony DSC-W50 prior to this camera, and it was a great point-and-shoot for its time. I thought things could only get better when I brought the DSC-W370 home.On the outside, the camera features a glossy finish, and stylish silver accents. In addition to the three inch view screen on the rear, this camera looked very sophisticated, yet trendy. Unfortunately, the picture quality never could live up to the hype.The picture quality was just awful. Let me back that bold statement up with a little bit of information. Although I am not a master of photography, I know my way around a camera. No matter which settings I chose, and no matter how much I played with the white balance, it was physically impossible for this camera to take anything better than average photos. By design, the pictures always came out flat, washed out, and lacking in any rich color whatsoever.Disregarding the picture quality, all of the other features of the camera seemed to work as promised. After spending a year of disappointment with this camera, I finally decided to give Sony one more chance. In fact, just recently I upgraded to the Sony DSC-WX10. Wow, what an improvement!At the end of the day, no matter how good a camera looks on the outside, and no matter how many bells, and whistles it has, if the camera cannot physically take good pictures, then it is not a smart investment.Overall rating is three stars out of five. I am still a Sony fan, but I do not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Mary S
Reviews.Author: Mary S.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera at Best Buy.  Since buying it, we have been completely disappointed.  The amount of lag time between pushing the button and the picture actually being captured is insane.  You will not capture any special moment, so don't even bother trying.  This camera is a true piece of junk.  It spends so long deciding to take the picture that you've missed your shot.  I stress-whatever you do, don't buy this piece of garbage.

Reviews.Title: Worst Sony Camera I've owned
Reviews.Author: Ras834
Reviews.Content: I owned 2 previous Cybershot Cameras so this one was a huge disappointment.  The lag is horrible and picture quality varies from good to horrible.  Can't take a decent "HD" video because the focus goes in and out as complained by other reviewers.  I was still under Sony warranty when I sent it in for repair as I figured I might have gotten a  lemon.  Sony is sending it back to me saying they found nothing wrong with it.  I even sent them a sample video showing the problem with the bad focusing.  After having two previous Cybershot cameras I was happy with this one will have me swearing off Sony cameras for good.  Should have bought a Cannon like everyone I know recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the Price
Reviews.Author: Christian H. A. Reis "Christian"
Reviews.Content: Simple, effective, pocket-size-point-and-shoot camera. Got it at Best Buy on a weekend sale + case + 4Gb card for about USD140+taxes.

Reviews.Title: Had high hopes, but the picture quality is disappointing
Reviews.Author: Trailman
Reviews.Content: Just take a look at the picture of the Eiffel Tower that I uploaded to the customer picture section. My wife used my 7 year old Olympus C340, a clunky dynosaur of a digital camera. I used the Sony that had just bought for this trip in a rush on the way to the airport.Yes, the gadgets are impressive. I like the panoramic pictures. The resolution is low (video resolution), but it still beats manual stitching.However, all of this is of no use on a camera that does not take decent pictures. Both pictures in my comparison were taken from the same perspective on the same day at the same time. The Olympus picture beats the Sony in all disciplines. It is sharper, the colors are crisper and more accurate, there is more detail (look at the leaves), and all of this with 1/5th of the resolution.The Sony DSC-W370 is not a keeper.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W370 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Russell J. Pendred
Reviews.Content: This is a great product at a wonderful price, thanks to Azazon.com The product performance is equal to my $2000 Canon digital camera with a 18mm-270mm zoom lense -- great camera - high quality - excellent pricing - outstanding shippment time  RP

Reviews.Title: great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: George Huson
Reviews.Content: purchased to be able to carry with me in my pocket, really did not expect to much on picture quality. was greatly surprized. great pictures even at 7x full zoom!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I love this camera an all around great camera, even looks good!!!! Its extremely easy to use. Takes fantastic pictures and video. Its a snap to get great shots with all the automatic features. Takes great close ups and zooms in on far away objects or valleys, moutains whatever. Zoom in on close things like ten feet and its like you can zoom in and take a great shot of a green pepper at ten feet and it fills the whole picture with crystal clear image for blow ups or back rounds for your computer its great. I bought another one just for the car!!

Reviews.Title: Could be a lot better
Reviews.Author: MusicLover
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer who is hooked to her SLR, but I wanted something smaller to take overseas, or when I couldn't lug around my larger camera, so I looked into this. I have had it for 2 weeks and am returning it for a few reasons. For me the main one is that it is HORRIBLE with focusing. It seems to not be able to make-up its mind on how it wants to focus. Another issue, like many other complaints here is the video. I do not like all the noise in the zoom while filming, it's distracting.Some of the features were nice, such as the sweep panorama. But, overall I was not happy with this camera.I quickly bought the new Sony HX5V, which is a bit more expensive, but 10x better than this camera and I highly suggest it.

Reviews.Title: Blurry videos, average picture quality
Reviews.Author: B. Bernardo "comic cruiser"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera (DSC-370,Green) today and taken around 100 shots in different settings (day, night, indoor and outdoors) as well as used it's video mode (again in different settings with and without moving subjects). The price as well as the promise of impressive specs lured me to try this compact point and shoot. The results were disappointing. The pictures were average and some were blurry (in the short amount of time I've used it). I normally use a Sony alpha DSLR for serious photos and have also used a Nikon CoolPix L20. The photos were inferior to the Nikon and did not show as much details (the Nikon was only 10 MP). The videos were also repeatedly blurring in and out of focus (which was frustrating). The whirring noise (which was mentioned by other reviewers) was also present. The main problem may be the regular Sony lens (which is not the better Carl Zeiss lens).I also purchased a Sony Cybershot DSC-350 and will be trying it in the next few days. Upon initial assessment and using it side by side with a few pics and videos, it appears that the 350 has the upper hand, producing clearer pics and clearer videos. I will reserve judgment on the 350 until I have examined it further though I must also mention that the 350 has the better Carl Zeiss lens despite being around $50 cheaper than the 370.I will be returning this DSC-370 largely due to average quality photos and poor quality videos( My DXG HD camcorder records better videos). If you must purchase a Sony, try to acquire one with the better quality lens as it makes a big difference.

Reviews.Title: good service/good product
Reviews.Author: S. Rogers
Reviews.Content: We pitched in and bought this camera for my dad.  He had an old one and we were tired of him having to put up with poor quality pictures.  He is really having a great time with this camera and the pictures are looking much better.

Reviews.Title: long delay
Reviews.Author: MarshaMarsha
Reviews.Content: If you like holding a camera still for what seems like 5 minutes, and getting a double flash, so everyone's eyes are closed, then this is the camera for you!  Action shots, forget it, birds have migrated to Mexico by the time the picture is taken.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: waihung
Reviews.Content: This camera is truly a great one. It has a lot of features for the price. And those features really work unlike on other brands.Great 14MP resolution, really really detailed pictures. And also pictures look vivid and bright.Night shots rarely have noise even when the ISO's turned up.For people who just want a simple and great camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: is a good camera, easy to use and with good zoom and resolution, very functional and the photos come out very good.

Reviews.Title: panorama, digital camera, w370, shoot digital cameras, photography, 14mp, 10x optical zoom, excelent
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: It Takes impressive, 14.1-megapixel photos with this compact digital camera. The DSC-W370 captures amazingly detailed images with a Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 34mm equivalent wide angle 7x zoom lens. Reviewing your shots is easy on the 3.0" LCD and advanced features including easy mode, iAuto and SteadyShot image stabilization eliminate the guesswork in tricky lighting environments. There's also awe-inspiring 243-degree sweep panorama mode and 720p HD movies. For displaying pictures in breathtaking HD, use the built-in HDMI output.I cetainly recommend this camera to  everyone.

Reviews.Title: Terrible video quality
Reviews.Author: Pixiella
Reviews.Content: I'm so disappointed with this camera.  My main complaint is that the video mode just doesn't focus properly.  It stays focused for 30 seconds or so then re-adjusts itself, blurs and re-focuses.  I thought I was doing something wrong and tried looking for settings to adjust, videoing different subjects, different lighting conditions etc. but nothing worked.  I looked online for a solution but just got forums with loads of other people complaining about the same problem.  I know it's not a video camera but even so ... I bought this Sony camera because the spec seems so high for the price but in the end it went back to the shop and I had to argue the toss for a refund.  The stills it takes are ok but the flash is blindingly bright meaning people tend to squint, the shutter lag is long and the battery life is poor.

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Bhavya
Reviews.Content: A very good one. Great compact 14 megapixel with high def video. After shooting over 200 pictures and about 15 minutes of video, the battery is still going. Amazing!Sony is the best camera i have ever found

Reviews.Title: Congratilations
Reviews.Author: Jose Flores
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with the purchase of this product. My sincere congratulations, hopefully with information on your part to purchase accessories and other devices.Sincerely, Jose Flores.

Reviews.Title: w370 review
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: w370 is ease to use but, focus was slower than i expected.  waiting time is about 4-5 second between shots that is too long.  it tends to over expose when taking shot at relately close distance which is a step backward compared to other sony products i used before i.e. w300 and tx7.  taking hd video, this camera seemed to loose focus quit a bit.  battery duration was another shortcoming.  other than these many weaknesses, this camera does do a good job taking pictures in day time and the resolution was great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Ruby Simon "Precious Ruby"
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera caz one of my friends has it. The picture quality is really good. Actually better than the slr i purchased. packing too was good. It was delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: I definitely do not like sony lenses.
Reviews.Author: M. L. Maurice Alfonso "m03"
Reviews.Content: I really didn't thought there was much difference between sony lens and carl zeiss, but yes.I compared this camera with a w350 that has the same features of the W370 but with a Carl Zeiss lens. I stayed with the w350.W370 It is not so disappointing, you'll have fun if you get it. but is much better the w350.

Reviews.Title: not what i expected in a sony camera
Reviews.Author: Vibin Koshy
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected in a Sony camera. not many options and the photos are not that of good quality

Reviews.Title: needs improvement/ very poor quality of pictures
Reviews.Author: James Makasiar "McGyver"
Reviews.Content: I am not so happy with this camera.1. You have to press the shutter for a few seconds before it snaps a picture.2. Recovery after every shot is long.3. the size is quite big and bulky.The video is good quality. Battery life is not so long. Stick with the sony DSC w330. it is sleek, lightweight and gets quick pictures with long battery life.The quality of the pictures is not getting any better. I have 8 out of every 10 shots that is out of focus. I have to request my objects to keep still otherwise, picture will be blurred when processed.This will soon be a piece of junk in my closet.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W370
Reviews.Author: R. Ritter
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. Small, light weight, easy to use, and takes good pictures. 7x optical zoom is a nice plus. I have no complaints about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: V. Avila "Mom of two"
Reviews.Content: Sony has never failed me when it comes to cameras. I've had three sony cameras and this one is very good for someone like me that just needs a camera to capture family moments on pics or video. I love the fact that you can zoom in when you're recording and the different settings you can use when taking pics. Love the camera. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: new camera for wifes b-day
Reviews.Author: W. Caldwell
Reviews.Content: the camera does everything it is supposed to do, out of the hundreds of pics we've already taken only a couple have not been up to par and for the over all price i am pretty happy the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Nolan D. Spann "Hawaiiliven"
Reviews.Content: best point and shoot camera i have ever had.  i bought it as a gift for my wife, and she loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: Not what it was made out to be
Reviews.Author: Hospice Nurse
Reviews.Content: This camera had info that was exaggerated!  The camera was returned after christmas and the money was used for a better camera.

Reviews.Title: sony DSC-370 a bulky deal
Reviews.Author: Kushal Mittal
Reviews.Content: the product is quite a lot bulky.its big in size ...heavy in weightand no that good in lookspicture results is like any other camu can enjoy these features in any other sony DSC seriesi would suggest sony cybershot DSC-350 a better value for money.

Reviews.Title: This is a "would be!"
Reviews.Author: sandymae
Reviews.Content: This camera would be a great product as is the case with most or all of Sony products....I say "would be"  because the camera is incomplete.  The camera is missing a memory card.  Since when is a camera sold without a memory card?  Even a sample memory card which allows only a few photos would be a great thing.  As it is, I have been sick & can't get out to purchase a memory stick so I have no idea if the camera even works. I will be glad to revise the review at such time when I can actually use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Stink stank stunk
Reviews.Author: Leigh P
Reviews.Content: My friend had the predecessor of this camera and when my Pentax optio sustained a "fall" this spring, I purchased the Canon Cybershot.  It's been terrible from the beginning.  The dial on the back of the camera spins far to easy - you reach for it, and it almost always is in video mode because the dial was inadvertently spun.  Indoor photography is slow and of very poor quality.  I'm not new to cameras. I own 3 Nikon SLR's, but you always want a point and shoot for sports and lesser events and I hoped that this would be the right one, after purchasing 2 Nikons for daughter in law and husband in 2009.  I'm so disappointed that I didn't buy the Nikon. Sony DSC-W370 14.1MP Digital Camera with 7x Wide Angle Zoom with Optical Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Green)Final straw was last weekend when I hosted a breast cancer fundraiser and the unit suddenly stopped working.  No display, just a grey screen and blank photos.  How frustrating.  Fortunately I had brought the Nikon as well as a back up, just in case.

Reviews.Title: I found the same camera for $180 with free shipping and bought it last week
Reviews.Author: Aren Tasci "goody"
Reviews.Content: i found the same camera Sony DSC-W370 14.1MP Digital Camera for $180 with free shipping in electronics expo with the coupon code STLENS and bought it last weeki received it in 2 days and i really loved it

14.1-megapixel resolution; 7x (34mm) optical zoom lens with 3.0-inch LCD
Capture breathtaking images in Sweep Panorama Mode
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur; iAuto detects 8 scenes and optimizes camera settings
Capture your videos in HD Movie mode (720p)
Accepts Memory Stick Duo/Memory Stick PRO Duo/Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-W370 14.1MP Digital Camera with 7x Wide Angle Zoom with Optical Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Red)
